definition: two-syllable word featuring alliteration or rhyme, such as 玲瓏|玲珑[ling2 long2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The study of LianMian Words is crucial for the study of Chinese vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 聯綿詞研究是漢語詞彙研究中的一個重要部分。
